column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=But some Brazilians still trust in President Lula , right ?
#Text=This number gets smaller each day .
#Text=But there are people who still believe in Santa Claus .
#Text=( laugh )
#Text=You excuse me but I do nt know how to speak about Lula without joking .
#Text=( laugh )
#Text=Roberto Jefferson
#Text=Why did Roberto Jefferson expose the scandal , in your opinion ?
#Text=Good question .
#Text=He had a rope around his neck .
#Text=Actually he detonated an atomic bomb , without knowing who was attacking him .
#Text=Actually the people who attacked him were his party mates and not José Dirceu .
#Text=This is related to those 4 millions reals and the sharing amongst them .
#Text=There were a lot of more money , but only 4 [ million ] were shared .
#Text=This is the root of the crisis detonated by him .
#Text=It seems that you got close to the ex-deputy Roberto Jefferson .
#Text=Could you tell us something about it ?
#Text=What does he think about your blog ?
#Text=We became friends and he was thankful for my correction , with him and with his family .
#Text=He said that I am very competent and that I am one of the best products of the whole crisis .
#Text=There is some deputy from the Workers Party ( PT )
#Text=who is a neighbor of Roberto Jefferson ?
#Text=Yes , all of them live over there .
#Text=By example : deputy Greenhalg [ Luiz Eduardo Greenhalg ] from PT lives there , next door too .
#Text=Rebelo [ Aldo Rebelo ] , the President of the Congress , too .
#Text=Almost all of them live at 302 North .
#Text=Is that a pretty wealthy neighborhood ?
#Text=Brasília is different from other cities in the world ; it is formed by blocks and not streets .
#Text=I am a neighbor of a block where there are only federal deputies , among them , Roberto Jefferson .
#Text=Deputies are very rich , sure .
#Text=Politics in Brazil makes people rich .
#Text=( laugh )
#Text=Is Roberto Jefferson still having instructions about singing ?
#Text=What does he like to sing ?
#Text=He continues .
#Text=Now he is having instructions with a baritone from the Municipial Theatre of Rio de Janeiro .
#Text=He is instructed in the afternoon , when he is in the city .
#Text=He likes romantic singers and lyrical songs .
#Text=He sings : My Way , Io che amo solo te , Dio come ti amo and other Italian songs like the one of Andrea Bocelli .
#Text=Would Roberto Jefferson accept to take part in a interview in Wikinews ?
#Text=I believe so , he is very open-minded person , to everything .
#Text=The trouble is that he has litle experience with the keyboard .
#Text=Another day he wrote a post in my blog and he had a hard time to find himself with the keyboard .
#Text=However someone could type for him , that is a solution .
#Text=Obviously we need to work on our tech for interviews , we 'd like to interview people who are n't familiar with technology and may have telephone interview facilities in the future .
